title: Boves, Somme
text:
Boves () is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Somme%20%28department%29">Somme</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in <a href="Hauts-de-France">Hauts-de-France</a> in northern <a href="France">France</a>.
Geography.
Boves is situated on the D935 and D116 road junction, on the banks of the <a href="Avre%20%28Somme%29">river Avre</a>, some southeast of <a href="Amiens">Amiens</a>.
